title: Fade to Black
description: A team of FBI agents is on the trail of the Reaper...a monster who auctions off death in a twisted cyber-game.  A team of FBI agents are on the trail of the Reaper--a monster who auctions off means-of-death at a cyber playgrounds for deviants. Special Agent Dean Taggert's investigation takes him to the small town of Hope Valley, Virginia, where he meets the strong and competent Sheriff Stacey Rhodes. Dean and Stacey are in a battle of wits against the Reaper, knowing he has chosen his next victim: a young child.
author: Leslie Parrish
